subject: Investing
title: The Role of Cash in Risk Management
description: One-minute skill: The Role of Cash in Risk Management.

hook.text: Warren Buffett held $150 billion in cash during 2023. Critics called it waste. Then opportunities appeared.

buildup.text: Cash is often dismissed as a drag on returns, but it serves as both a safety net and dry powder for bargains.

discovery.text: Holding 5-10% cash lets you buy quality assets at deep discounts during market panics without selling losers.

twist.text: In rising-rate environments, cash earns meaningful yieldâ€”sometimes rivaling stocks with zero volatility.

climax.text: The optimal cash level depends on your age, income stability, and how close you are to a major expense.

punchline.text: Cash isn't doing nothing. It's waiting for the right moment to do everything.

quiz.question: Why is holding some cash valuable in a portfolio?
options: It provides safety and buying power during market dips
Cash is the best long-term investment
